title: New: flor – ocean
body:
Oregon quartet **flor** show a darker, more sinister side on their newest offering, ocean.

Having gained numerous plaudits for their two uplifting earlier tracks, _get behind this_ and _heart_, _ocean_ finds them in a more introspective mood, whilst maintaining the killer songwriting instincts that makes them such an exciting prospect. With an EP expected next month, 2015 is shaping up pretty well for **flor**. Check it out below.
